role_description: An Ansible role that installs sysdig (a Linux system exploration and troubleshooting tool) on Linux and MacOS
role_description_full_overview: [sysdig](https://www.sysdig.com/) is a simple tool for deep system visibility, exploration and troubleshooting, with native support for containers.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs sysdig (a Linux system exploration and troubleshooting tool) on Linux and MacOS.
